markdownRemark.html: Guadalmina is only a few minutes from the town of San Pedro de Alc치ntara, between Marbella and Sotogrande.This 18-hole course was inaugurated in 1959 and is the second oldest on the Costa del Sol. Guadalmina has two golf courses (North and South) with 18 holes and a 9-hole par 3 course. In addition, it has a driving range for 40 players with a covered platform for 21 seats, a chipping and practice bunker and a putting green.
